subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia, who allowed just one run to the Orioles, pitched a complete game as the Yankees advanced to the American League Championship Series, where they will play the Tigers.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia, who allowed just one run to the Orioles, pitched a complete game as the Yankees advanced to the American League Championship Series, where they will play the Tigers.
